text: Era siyinza kubagamba (mmwe) nti nina amawanika ga Katonda, era simanyi byekusifu, sigamba nti mazima nze ndi Malayika era sigamba abo amaaso ga mmwe begatawa kitiibwa nti Katonda tagenda kubawa birungi, Katonda y'amanyidde ddala ebyo ebiri mu mitima gya bwe, n'olwekyo mazima nze nemmala nkikola ddala mbeera mu beeyisa obubi
